### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#16224](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/16224.html) (gui: Bilingual GUI error messages by hebast

> Please note that the removed headers are not "unused" in these files by being transitively included by other still included headers.

I don't get it, if the removed headers _are used_ (transitively included) where comes the reduction?

Or you mean that just _some of the removed_ are transitively included?
